If you're looking for a legal drama with interesting characters and a compelling story, then "A Few Good Men" might be the perfect movie for you. It stars Michael DeLorenzo and Matt Craven and tackles the complexities of military law and heroism. 

If you're interested in a revengeful thriller with high stakes, "The Client" starring William Sanderson and John Diehl could be a good choice. It explores themes of manipulation and the lengths people will go to achieve their goals.

If you're drawn to a heartwarming family drama about a young deer who challenges the family's established traditions, then "The Yearling" might be more your style. It stars Forrest Tucker and Jane Wyman and offers a heartwarming tale of love and loss.

Finally, if you prefer a larger-scale action film with dramatic twists and turns, then "Tombstone" might be a good fit. It stars Dana Delany and Powers Boothe and features high-octane action and a surprising climax.
